name: Furachi's Dungeon Escape (F.D.E)
description:
#Important note: while in the current stage of development, higher resolutions are recommended for intended game play. #

F.D.E. is an in development game that tests the limits of the mind with an advanced puzzle mechanic. Explore the world with yourself where you must discover your own abilities to triumph against the environment. Be polite! Hold the door for yourself, help yourself get around, and even step up on yourself to get around. Curious about what I mean? Jump in and find out! You will come to understand the extents of what you can do, and learn that when you have yourself, there is nothing you can not do! Want to challenge yourself? Pick up F.D.E. and find out what you can do!
